title: Kaufman - Colorful, Soft, Absorbent 30"X60" Hibiscus Fiber Reactive Beach Towel with ENDHEM - 4 PC Pack - 1427-4PK
features: 100% high quality cotton fiber reactive velour makes our towels feel soft and luxurious on your skin after the beach, pool, or shower. The thick, plush texture of velour on one side and the cotton terry loops on the other side makes this a perfect and versatile quick dry, highly absorbent towel. The high quality 100% cotton ensures optimum softness, absorbency, and durability

The plush soft cotton towel in vibrant, colorful fiber reactive colors absorbs moisture from your body while wrapping you in warmth and coziness. It is sure to become a favorite for use day after day. 4 pc pack - 1 of each color (Blue, Green, Pink, Orange)

30x60 is the perfect size for the entire family -adults and children. These towels are generously size for use at home in the bathroom, at the pool or by the beach. Our towels are designed to be easy to wash and dry as well as compact and versatile enough to pack and use for travel anywhere- beach, pool, lake, camp site, gym, and picnic grounds. We offer several print designs to enable each person to have their own individual generous size towel.

Easy Care: - Wash towels separately from other items of clothing to help decrease the transfer of towel lint to other pieces of clothing. - Use cold water to wash towels to avoid color bleeding. - Always use a mild detergent when washing towels. You may use a larger amount of detergent on towels that are heavily soiled. -Tumble dry on low To protect the longevity of your towel: - Do not use fabric softeners or bleach which will alter the look and feel of your towel.

We guarantee you will love and enjoy our towels. Our commitment to excellence ensures we will deliver to you the customer great service, style, quality, and value. We stand behind every towel we sell and will do everything to ensure you are happy with your purchase.
description: Ben Kaufman Sales Presents 4 pc pack Printed Hibsicus beach towel.
